caption: In the photograph, a woman stands next to a car at what appears to be an auto show. She is wearing a long, flowing, teal dress with a deep V-neck and a large belt around the waist. Her hair is styled straight and she wears matching teal makeup. She has on open-toed sandals. The car is a dark sedan with the front door open, showcasing its interior. Behind the woman and the car, there is a red background with "MANTA LUXUS" in white capitalized letters. The overall setting seems to be a promotional event for the car, and the woman likely serves as a model to attract attention to the vehicle. The carpet underfoot is beige, and there appears to be an electrical cable curling on the floor near the womanâ€™s feet.
title: AutoMobile show at the New York Coliseum at Columbus Circle in Midtown Manhattan
